entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
